ritigala kandata piwisennata mulinma aththe kuda gal kulu kihipayak udini.ee samangama apata hamu wanne tharamaka diga palalakin yuthu gambaura adi 30k tharam wu gara watunu"banda pokuna" nam wu suwishala pokunayi.in pasuwa thanin thana wisiri pathiri athi gal palam,piyagata peli,kawakara wu shailamaya wedika,opamattam karana ladawishala gal puwaru,selmuwa pahan,thataka,beheth oru,sala pathala malu,sakman malu,kataran ketu gal len,pathanagara ha gal kulunuya.me siyallakma apata kiya panne ape athitha wasthu widyawe wismitha nirmanathmaka shakthiyayi.eda siti rajawarunagesanniwedi manasika gathi lakshanayanya.

indiyawa yana namin wu me rata lesin pawathimata pera patanma jambudwipaya bharatha deshaya ha dambaadiwa washayen pawathi samaye di pawa akhanda awurudu 2323ka pera kalayedi pawa (aithihasika ha purawidyathmaka sakshida samanga salakimedi) me derata athara itha samipa sabandathawayak anekuth sak kalapiya kisima ratakata wada pawathi bawa purawidyathmaka ha ෙethihasika thorathuru adhyayanaye yedena kenakuta daknata labena bawa amuthuwen sandahan kalayuthu nowe.sabawinma dakunu aasiyanu sahayogitha sanwidhanaya (sak kalapaya) ta ayath ratawal pilibanda wimasa balana wita maladiwayina ha shri lankawa hara anekuth sak ratawal siyallama puranakalaye bharatha deshaya, bharatha warsha brayatawartha yana namin handin wu ee maha bhugoliya kalapayata ayath wanneya.ee anuwa wathman indiyawa, pakisthanaya, afganisthanaya, bhutanaya, nepalaya ha bangladeshaya yana ratawala siyallama eda mita wasara 2320 pamana ihatha di jambudwipaya dambaadiwa aga raju lesin siti asoka maha adhirajayage palana pradeshayata ayath wu bawa purawidyathmaka sakshiyakin adawanawita oppu kala hakiwa atha.
mema pilithuru sawadanawa asa sitina pottu amman mese kiyayi.
